insights.title: Coordinated activity between high-risk accounts
insights.summary: Detected a tightly connected cluster of accounts sharing network infrastructure and devices.
insights.remediation: Quarantine shared devices and rerun enrichment checks on linked accounts.

insights.title: Sudden spike in anomalous transfers
insights.summary: Transfers above the median value increased 4.7x over the last hour across a single community.
insights.remediation: Escalate to tier-2 review and pause outbound settlements in the flagged community.
